definition: lit. raised up by Xiao He, cast down by Xiao He (idiom), alluding to Han Xin 韓信|韩信[Han2 Xin4] being made Grand General 大將軍|大将军[da4 jiang1 jun1]/fig. a situation where one's success and failure are both due to the same factor
pinyin: cheng2 ye3 Xiao1 He2 , bai4 ye3 Xiao1 He2

definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
